name: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology and Systems

requirements.name: I. Core Curriculum Requirements: 42 semester credit hours2

options.description: Select any 6 semester credit hours from Communication Core courses (see advisor)
Or select any 3 semester credit hours from Mathematics Core courses (see advisor)
Select any 6 semester credit hours from Life and Physical Sciences Core courses (see advisor and degree requirements)
Select any 3 semester credit hours from Language, Philosophy and Culture Core courses (see advisor)
Select any 3 semester credit hours from Creative Arts Core courses (see advisor)
Select any 6 semester credit hours from American History Core courses (see advisor)
Or select any 6 semester credit hours from Government/Political Science Core courses (see advisor)

courses.description: Or select any 3 semester credit hours from Social and Behavioral Sciences Core courses (see advisor)
Or select any 6 semester credit hours from Component Area Option Core courses (see advisor)

requirements.name: II. Major Requirements: 75-78 semester credit hours

options.name: A practicum experience of at least 160 working hours is required; the student has the option of zero to 3 semester credit hours, depending on the particular internship, and preference for additional electives.
A community engagement experience is required; the student has the option of zero or 3 semester credit hours, depending on the particular experience, and preference for additional electives.

courses.description: or ENTP 4340 Social Sector Entrepreneurship and Community Engagement

options.description: Choose from the following to fulfill remaining Guided Elective semester credit hours:
Students may choose one of the following tracks:
Any ITSS upper-division course, excluding ITSS 4301 Database Systems13, that is not part of the BS INTS major preparatory, major core, or major related courses.
Any 2 ITSS upper-division courses, excluding ITSS 4301 Database Systems13, that are not part of the BS INTS major preparatory, major core, or major related courses.

Any ITSS upper-division courses, excluding ITSS 4301 Database Systems13, that are not part of the BS INTS major preparatory, major core, or major related courses may be used to satisfy the 12 semester credit hours of guided elective credit.

requirements.name: III. Elective Requirements: 0-3 semester credit hours

options.description: Both lower- and upper-division courses may count as electives but students must complete at least 51 semester credit hours of upper-division courses to qualify for graduation.
